paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The most common genetic variant was Val122Ile, found in 37 patients.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The study included both hereditary and wild type cases.
key_quotes: The most common genetic variant was Val122Ile, which was found in 37 patients (64%) of those who were gene positive.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
